attributes.additional_details: Since the bid was rejected it has progressed into a thriving town with at top 5 university status. A busy town centre with top designer shop. A category 1 station with good schools both public and private. Most people think Guildford is a city already as it has had a cathedral for many years now.
attributes.background: Guildford is the county town of Surrey and  a bid in was rejected in 2002. It is time to make a change.
